h3.div: Go here to receive your payment faster!

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 40px; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.small: *Payments will begin around April 17th. [expand here for details]

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: You will automatically receive a check from the government if: (1) you have a qualifying income, AND (2) if you have filed a tax return for 2019 or 2018.
If you have not filed in 2018 or 2019, use this tool: https://turbotax.intuit.com/stimulus-check/

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: who file as head of household with income up to $112,500 will get the full $1,200 check.

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: with income up to $150,000 will get $2,400.

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: with income up to $75,000 will get a $1,200 payment.

div.small: Qualifying households with children will get an additional $500 per child under 17.
Reduced payments for higher income up to income limits.

small.span: Resources for anxiety and your mental health in a global climate of uncertainty

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.strong: Crisis Text Line: Text HOME to 74171

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.small: Mental Health Association in New Jersey, Inc.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.small: For residents who are having difficulty coping with the COVID19 crisis. For emotional support, guidance and

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.small: mental health referrals as needed, call between 8am-8pm.

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Would You Like to Learn Strategies for Supporting Your Child's Math Work at Home?

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Dr. Judith Fraivillig, math education professor and consultant

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: is offering free, online workshops for families to learn how best to support their children's math learning at home.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Workshops focus on elementary children's math thinking, activities and games to play at home, and mathematizing household routines.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Online sessions last between 30-60 minutes and are organized to include approximately 5 families with children in similar grade levels. This small group format allows for plenty of time to ask questions.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc
